title: The Christmas visitor
creator_credit: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, Phoenix Films and John Halas
brief_description: Presents an animated adaptation of Clement Moore’s poem entitled A visit from St. Nicholas. While Santa is resting, the toys from his bundle burst forth in a flurry of activity and the adventure of Christmas begins.
creator_credit_for_label: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, Phoenix Films and John Halas
